verses.esv: 12 Fight the good fight of the faith. Take hold of the eternal life to which you were called and about which you made the good confession in the presence of many witnesses.
verses.kjv: 12 Fight the good fight of faith, lay hold on eternal life, whereunto thou art also called, and hast professed a good profession before many witnesses.
verses.niv: 12 Fight the good fight of the faith. Take hold of the eternal life to which you were called when you made your good confession in the presence of many witnesses.

verses.esv:
Of David.

144:1   Blessed be the LORD, my rock,
    who trains my hands for war,
    and my fingers for battle;
verses.kjv: 1 Blessed be the LORD my strength, which teacheth my hands to war, and my fingers to fight:
verses.niv: 1 Praise be to the LORD my Rock, who trains my hands for war, my fingers for battle.

verses.esv:
8   a time to love, and a time to hate;
  a time for war, and a time for peace.
verses.kjv: 8 A time to love, and a time to hate; a time of war, and a time of peace.
verses.niv: 8 a time to love and a time to hate, a time for war and a time for peace.

verses.esv: 7 Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
verses.kjv: 7 Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
verses.niv: 7 Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

verses.esv: 14 The LORD will fight for you, and you have only to be silent.”
verses.kjv: 14 The LORD shall fight for you, and ye shall hold your peace.
verses.niv: 14 The LORD will fight for you; you need only to be still."

verses.esv: 4 for he is God’s servant for your good. But if you do wrong, be afraid, for he does not bear the sword in vain. For he is the servant of God, an avenger who carries out God’s wrath on the wrongdoer.
verses.kjv: 4 For he is the minister of God to thee for good. But if thou do that which is evil, be afraid; for he beareth not the sword in vain: for he is the minister of God, a revenger to execute wrath upon him that doeth evil.
verses.niv: 4 For he is God's servant to do you good. But if you do wrong, be afraid, for he does not bear the sword for nothing. He is God's servant, an agent of wrath to bring punishment on the wrongdoer.

verses.esv: 36 I tell you, on the day of judgment people will give account for every careless word they speak, 37 for by your words you will be justified, and by your words you will be condemned.”
verses.kjv: 36 But I say unto you, That every idle word that men shall speak, they shall give account thereof in the day of judgment. 37 For by thy words thou shalt be justified, and by thy words thou shalt be condemned.
verses.niv: 36 But I tell you that men will have to give account on the day of judgment for every careless word they have spoken. 37 For by your words you will be acquitted, and by your words you will be condemned."

verses.esv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
verses.kjv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
verses.niv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness.

verses.esv: 33 I have said these things to you, that in me you may have peace. In the world you will have tribulation. But take heart; I have overcome the world.”
verses.kjv: 33 These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
verses.niv: 33 "I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world."

verses.esv: 4:1 What causes quarrels and what causes fights among you? Is it not this, that your passions are at war within you? 2 You desire and do not have, so you murder. You covet and cannot obtain, so you fight and quarrel. You do not have, because you do not ask.
verses.kjv: 1 From whence come wars and fightings among you? come they not hence, even of your lusts that war in your members? 2 Ye lust, and have not: ye kill, and desire to have, and cannot obtain: ye fight and war, yet ye have not, because ye ask not.
verses.niv: 1 What causes fights and quarrels among you? Don't they come from your desires that battle within you? 2 You want something but don't get it. You kill and covet, but you cannot have what you want. You quarrel and fight. You do not have, because you do not ask God.

verses.esv: 12 For we do not wrestle against flesh and blood, but against the rulers, against the authorities, against the cosmic powers over this present darkness, against the spiritual forces of evil in the heavenly places.
verses.kjv: 12 For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places.
verses.niv: 12 For our struggle is not against flesh and blood, but against the rulers, against the authorities, against the powers of this dark world and against the spiritual forces of evil in the heavenly realms.

verses.esv:
15   When justice is done, it is a joy to the righteous
    but terror to evildoers.
verses.kjv: 15 It is joy to the just to do judgment: but destruction shall be to the workers of iniquity.
verses.niv: 15 When justice is done, it brings joy to the righteous but terror to evildoers.

verses.esv: 2 Look out for the dogs, look out for the evildoers, look out for those who mutilate the flesh.
verses.kjv: 2 Beware of dogs, beware of evil workers, beware of the concision.
verses.niv: 2 Watch out for those dogs, those men who do evil, those mutilators of the flesh.

verses.esv: 22 But I say to you that everyone who is angry with his brother will be liable to judgment; whoever insults his brother will be liable to the council; and whoever says, ‘You fool!’ will be liable to the hell of fire.
verses.kjv: 22 But I say unto you, That whosoever is angry with his brother without a cause shall be in danger of the judgment: and whosoever shall say to his brother, Raca, shall be in danger of the council: but whosoever shall say, Thou fool, shall be in danger of hell fire.
verses.niv: 22 But I tell you that anyone who is angry with his brother will be subject to judgment. Again, anyone who says to his brother, 'Raca, 'is answerable to the Sanhedrin. But anyone who says, 'You fool!' will be in danger of the fire of hell.

verses.esv: 10 The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy. I came that they may have life and have it abundantly.
verses.kjv: 10 The thief cometh not, but for to steal, and to kill, and to destroy: I am come that they might have life, and that they might have it more abundantly.
verses.niv: 10 The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy; I have come that they may have life, and have it to the full.

verses.esv: 22 Abstain from every form of evil.
verses.kjv: 22 Abstain from all appearance of evil.
verses.niv: 22 Avoid every kind of evil.

verses.esv:
5   Through you we push down our foes;
    through your name we tread down those who rise up against us.
verses.kjv: 5 Through thee will we push down our enemies: through thy name will we tread them under that rise up against us.
verses.niv: 5 Through you we push back our enemies; through your name we trample our foes.

verses.esv: 31 What then shall we say to these things? If God is for us, who can be against us?
verses.kjv: 31 What shall we then say to these things? If God be for us, who can be against us?
verses.niv: 31 What, then, shall we say in response to this? If God is for us, who can be against us?

verses.esv: 7 I have fought the good fight, I have finished the race, I have kept the faith.
verses.kjv: 7 I have fought a good fight, I have finished my course, I have kept the faith:
verses.niv: 7 I have fought the good fight, I have finished the race, I have kept the faith.

verses.esv:
13   The LORD goes out like a mighty man,
    like a man of war he stirs up his zeal;
  he cries out, he shouts aloud,
    he shows himself mighty against his foes.
verses.kjv: 13 The LORD shall go forth as a mighty man, he shall stir up jealousy like a man of war: he shall cry, yea, roar; he shall prevail against his enemies.
verses.niv: 13 The LORD will march out like a mighty man, like a warrior he will stir up his zeal; with a shout he will raise the battle cry and will triumph over his enemies.

verses.esv: 19 Behold, I have given you authority to tread on serpents and scorpions, and over all the power of the enemy, and nothing shall hurt you.
verses.kjv: 19 Behold, I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions, and over all the power of the enemy: and nothing shall by any means hurt you.
verses.niv: 19 I have given you authority to trample on snakes and scorpions and to overcome all the power of the enemy; nothing will harm you.

verses.esv:
17   When the righteous cry for help, the LORD hears
    and delivers them out of all their troubles.
verses.kjv: 17 The righteous cry, and the LORD heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.
verses.niv: 17 The righteous cry out, and the LORD hears them; he delivers them from all their troubles.

verses.esv: 11 Put on the whole armor of God, that you may be able to stand against the schemes of the devil.
verses.kjv: 11 Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.
verses.niv: 11 Put on the full armor of God so that you can take your stand against the devil's schemes.

verses.esv:
3   The LORD is a man of war;
    the LORD is his name.
verses.kjv: 3 The LORD is a man of war: the LORD is his name.
verses.niv: 3 The LORD is a warrior; the LORD is his name.

verses.esv: 13 I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
verses.kjv: 13 I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
verses.niv: 13 I can do everything through him who gives me strength.
